variable.description: This command assigns one,more strings to a variable name for evaluation later in the input script,during a simulation.

create_box.description: This command creates a simulation box based on the specified region

lattice.description: Define a lattice for use by other commands

region.description: This command defines a geometric region of space

create_atoms.description: This command creates atoms (or molecules) on a lattice, or a single atom (or molecule), or a random collection of atoms (or molecules), as an alternative to reading in their coordinates explicitly via a read_data or read_restart command

group.description: Identify a collection of atoms as belonging to a group
